10/2017
‚óºÔ∏è No Product Description

 

"Highly Concentrated" | "Recommended ratio: 3%-5%, this format is not fixed, customers can adjust it based on personal preference" - HealthCabin.net

 

Health Cabin Facebook Messenger Response 10/17: 
"Tobacco flavors: 3-5% | Non-Tobacco flavors:5-10% |No - Diacetyl or Acetyl Propionyl - facebook.com/HealthCabin

 

üîπHealth Cabin Concentrate Image: Either the Filipino "Ube" Yam or Japanese "Red" Yam? 

 
___
üìëUbe (oo-beh) Yam: tuberous root vegetable ... less starchy, sweeter & softer Purple Flesh üìë Satsuma Imo (Japanese "Red" Yam): Deep Auburn in color...the flesh is dry & white... starchy and subtly sweet
__________________________________________________

 

**10/17/2017** 

SF Test:  **2**% | 60/40 | Wasp Nano | 316L SS Fused Clapton | Japanese Org.Cotton

Concentrate Bottle Aroma = Very Strong

 

‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 Hour Steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle Test:**  Smell & Taste

-- Aroma Intensity - Strong | Floral...Light "Earthy-ness"...over Softer Starchy "Root"

-- Sweet & Smooth | Hint of Floral | More *Pumpkin-esque* than Yam...

 

‚òÖTaste purchased sample from Asian Food Market - Ube Yam & Satsuma Yam 1 week Steep | 1 Boiled & 1 Raw‚òÖ
__________________________________________________
**10/24/2017  (1 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:** Aroma Intensity Strong but more Balanced | Aroma similar to "Candied Yams" or an Amalgamation of a Pumpkin/Sweet Potato 

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Sweet | Creamy | Somewhat Starchy |Spice...Pumpkin Spice...Nutmeg..? 
- Dominant with a Soft "Root" 


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mod. Sweet, Smooth, Creamy | Mod. Starchy "Candied Yam" / Pumpkin Pie like flavor....

-----| Thick & Creamy Body | Full Coated & Slightly Dry Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes:Not a Ube Yam or Japanese Red Yam | More Akin to an Amalgamation of a Pumpkin & Candied Sweet Potato | Light Floral Note = Spice*

 

‚òëÔ∏è **Comparison Preparation: Raw & *Steamed**

 

üç†**Ube Yam Sample**: Soft, Creamy "Paste" like Consistency, Semi Dry & Starchy | Potato-esque & Soft Root Aroma /Flavor with Nut like Creaminess & Light Sweetness
 
üç†**Satsuma Imo Sample**: Soft & Mod Dry | Creamy & Powdery "Paste" like & Texture | Starchy - Softer Root/Potato-esque Aroma & Flavor

__________________________________________________
**10/31/2017 (2  Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Unchanged From Wk 1 ‚úì

"Candied Yams" / Amalgamation of a Pumpkin/Sweet Potato with Spice*


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Unchanged from Wk 1 ‚úì

‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mod. Sweet & Smooth | Mod. Starchy | Bold

üìå"Candied Yam" / "Sweet Potato Pie" (no crust) with Mod. Spice Notes (Front)

---| Mod.Heavy Body / Full Coated Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Same as Above | Not Off Putting

‚Ä¢ Spice Note* Identifiable = Cinnamon..Nutmeg
__________________________________________________
**11/08/2017 ( 3.1 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Unchanged From Wks 1 & 2 ‚úì
  
Rich Aroma of "Candied Yams" / Amalgamation of a Pumpkin/Sweet Potato with Spice*

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Unchanged From Wks 1 & 2 ‚úì

Sweet, Smooth & Lightly Creamy | Spice...Pumpkin Spice* - Dominant with a Soft Root-like Starch 

‚Ä¢ **Vape:**  Strong | Mod. Sweet & Smooth | Mod. Starchy | Bold üî∏"Candied Yam" with Mod. Spice Notes: Nutmeg...Clove...Hint of Cinnamon (Front)

---| Medium Body | Smooth & Slightly Watery Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Spice* üìå Strong & Rich "Candied Yam"  vs Plain Yam 

‚Ä¢  Uses & Pairings: Pastries & Bakeries  | Pie Crust, Marshmallow, Whipped Cream, Butter, Brown Sugar, etc...
__________________________________________________

Estimate 

‚ñ∫ Usage:  .45 - .6% min  | .7 - 1% med   | 1.25 - 1.5% max
   
 Mix: .5 - 1%
